values:
helloooooooooooooo

ok normally i would never do this, but i must dedicate my entry to jessica susan dirocco and the retardedness that bonds our girls together.  i just spent 17!!!!!!!! minutes on the phone with her for no reason...and the only thing that was arrived at is that we must reeducate people on the ways of living like a ghini gangsta. what is wrong with us? we're supposed to be the SMART ones.

ps ali smells

i hate yous. 
fuck you and your transparency and your falsehoods.

i
am 
so
sick.

whats up everyone. 
the other night, tuesday to be specific, was probably one of the most fun nights i've had at college.

me, nizzly, and daire--tuesday night crew--were planning on keeping it low key and kind of easy, but oh no...

we decided to play kings with 40's of o.e
before too long, i was in an indian headdress, and we were completely smashed. then we decided it would be a good idea to wake people up with brooms and live turtles...needless to say it wasnt in retrospect.
then i thought it would be a good idea to get even more intoxicated and go see the gates in central park while the sun rose. we went up town at around 6 am, and passed out on a baseball bench in central park while we watched the sun rising and it was so much fun. then we got breakfast and passed out at 9 am.  i was out from the night before while i was supposed to be in an 8 am class..thats fucking crazy.

now i feel like shit.
im MO sick.
i might die.
peace.

heeeeeyy

last night was quite possibly one of the best nights ive had in a long time....aka since the semester started....plenty of debauchery, raspberries, substance, DANCING!!, eating, more debauchery, bonding, serenading, wet hot american summer....oh man...we didnt go home til 6 30 am! ahhhh

oh man.

ok. usually i sit down to write when i am extremely bored or angry or both.  but right now, i was about to play a quick game before i was going to take a shower and as i signed on i saw on aol news that johnny carson died this morning.

this probably isnt a big deal to anyone our age. and i didnt know johnny carson, but he was a huge part of my childhood.  everynight when i lived in queens i would fight my mom for control of the remote to watch the tonight show.  its one of my fondest memories of childhood and helped to shape a lot of who i am today.  reading that he died made me sad for some reason, and i cant really explain it.

ahh! i just ate and im still so hungry.

i decided i want to make more random live journal entries...i havent really written too much in the last six months.

i watched mean streets the other day, and ive come to some conclusions...even when playing a pychopath robert deniro was HOT. like really hot.  i also decided that johnny boy, robert deniro's character, is one of my favorite movie characters ever.

also, i originally decided not to make any new years resolutions.  after careful consideration however, i've decided to make one.  my new year's resolution for 2005 is to have a sugar daddy at some point this year.  this is not a simple task.  im quickly coming up on the age where sugar daddies are no longer attainable.  i need to do this before im 20.  also, i must lose weight, get a hard bod, find a better fake id that will grant me access into sugar daddy hangouts aka swanky bars and lounges...cause lord only knows i will never find a sugar daddy hanging on the 12th floor or in the backroom of cosmic cantina...but i digress, i must also tan, make more money so as to buy new clothes that dont make me look like a bag lady, and all around become a classier broad.  this may seem daunting, but i vow to do it.  if you will it, it will be so.
sucka.

--al green is the most amazing thing ever. i love listening to him, even his not so great songs are way great.  he's like my black frank sinatra.

since the semester ended all ive been doing is staying up late for no reason and sleeping until 2 oclock. last night i watched cape fear....weird movie.

i think ill do more of the same today.

roar.

whatup nuggas

ok, i have no real reason to write other than to record what me and my daddy did the other day as the greatest bonding experience ever....

since i graduate middle school he promised to take me to peter luger's steak house...almost five years later, two plus years of veggitarianism, and a fight on christmas eve, i finally convinced my dad to take me to peter luger's!! me and fat joe made fun of all the fat bastards in the resturant, bonded, and ate steak!!! then on the ride home we smoked long cigars and made fun of people. <33333

anyways. im also having a new years crisis. oside or manhattan?? it shouldnt even be a question but it is.

...because on my way to class i can see someone vomitting who isnt a student
...because they pay me to sit on my fat ass
...because everyone is sometimes miserable, sometimes the cheeriest motherfucker ever, but they're always ready to get drizzle
...because the waitress who just served me a gallon of beer asks me how my first semester at college was
...because the sadaam hussein lookin motherfucker who works at the deli is  now my best friend
...because all three of my "boyfriends" can drink 2 bottles of 99 apples and still stand the next day
...because rachel can read my mind
...because ive seen every fucking episode of aqua teen hunger force at least six times
...because i saw my future sugar daddy aka chris noth in between classes
...because i am a sugar momma
...because...

sorry for that retarted update, but i had no choice.

hey.

ahh! the end of the semester sucks! i have so much work and yet i am still doing nothing with my life aka playing quarters and getting harassed all weekend when i should have been studying.

damn!!

also the idea of being discussed is so foreign.

alright.
i have a strange urge to update. i dont know why.

i want to say that i am happy. yes, despite being nervous about work that i am currently putting off, sleep deprevation, weight gain, being a broke ass ho, failing, and everything else that makes me nervous, i am happy.  not that i was ever depressed in my entire life, or even sad--usually just angry, but at this stage i am happy.  i love living in manhattan, and i love my family more than ever, i love my friends new and old--and i know if they all met theyd love each other too. i love who i was and i love who i am becoming. i love the inevitable change that growing up brings, and i love that while tastes and appearences may vary, ill always be alexandra motherfucking palmieri.

and i say fuck you to everyone who doesnt like who i was, who i am, and who i will be. better yet, i quote the one and only evans when i say "Resolve: Fuck em, fuck em all..."

things that make me happy:

-denis leary!
-jessie visiting me
-seeing stinky
-GETTING A JOB MOTHAFUCKA!
-going to things for free
-drinking 2 gallons of beer plus 3 more cans on a monday night with friends
-will ferrell
-burritto's
-joe's pizza
-COSMIC CANTINA!!!!!!!
-goulet

impurities!!!!

i saw the beastie boys tonight!!!

one good, one bad.

i just went on a cleaning rampage.
someone save me from this room.

oh man
my back is KILLING me.

today was quite possibly the worst day ive had in a very long time...maybe even this whole summer.

i had four classes, and basically did not sit down until after 7. it was rainy and humid and cold all at the same time.
i had the WORST class ive ever been in and almost immediatley switched out of it afterwards, into a class that i also dont want to take but have no choice at this point as it was the last class with an opening.

for all you devoted olsen twin fans out there, mary kate has been seen in actual classes. but alas, i have yet to see them myself.

anyways, i changed my schedule and now it sucks. i have 9 30 class monday-thursday, and 5 oclock class 3 days a week.
shitty shitty schedule.

im tired.

hey.

so yeah my 10 days of fun are now officially over and classes start tomorrow.

last night was our last night to do anything really, so me and my brother got dinner and a pitcher of margaritas which was nice. then me my bro, bryan and lisa from the north tower went to my brothers dorm, drank some beers, they smoked, and kind of just relaxed. 

it takes south park at 2 am to make me realize how great that show is.

and it takes drunked kids in the courtyard at 3 am to make you realize your parents are paying 43g's a year for experiences like that.

so yeah.
classes start tomorrow.

heeey.

oh man, let me just start off by saying i have done everything a freshmen at college should not do.

the other night we went to the lemon bar.  thanks to my brother, i had stoli peach to pregame with and it was amazing! So me, rachel, violette, matt, bryan, and some other people i cant remember head to the lemon bar real early to get in free.

we go in, sit down, dance a little have a good time.  every night the same kid is promoting the clubs, so we talked to him and he told us to come to his table cause its his birthday.  we go to the back, and there is BOTTLE AFTER BOTTLE of GREY GOOSE!!! i felt like i was in an r.kelly video, i was living my wildest dreams....hhahaha.
i drank so much, i went a little too crazy and did a few regrettable things, like not know how i got home or what i did for about 2 hours.
so yeah...college is quite the experience.

anyways since then ive met a lot of chill people. some really hot gay guys, and a few kids at gallatin. so its been pretty good.

soot moved in today, so tonight is going to be off the hizzy fo sho. wow. what a loser i am.

anyways, im out nukkka.

mr. dorfman
hellooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo


hey whats up.
yeah its probably been a while, i dont remember. all i know is that my modem sucked at home, and it stillsucks here at 3rd north.

so yeah im at school.
and im not very sociable.

i met a few people while smoking in the courtyard.  they were coool.  i went out with a few people to this place luhan that stephen baldwin owns, but it sucked and it was crowded so we left after like 10 minutes and then me and 3 others girls headed over to burrito loco, where we enjoyed overpriced yet tasty margharitas. after which, this one girl got pretty drunk and we went back to her dorm and she was being pretty funny.

uhh im pretty boring so, ill stop.

i just ripped this off from dan tain, and didnt change as many answers as i thought i would...creepy

hey
havent updated in a while
hmm lets see

i look kind of human, as i went to bermuda for a week with the fam (CARB CRUISE 2004...oh how i wish i was back on the ZENITH....) had fun, drank enough to slow me down for a while, drank with the ZENITH wait-staff, won the smallest prize for bingo, tanned!,had quality family bonding/gambeling/fighting/drinking time, didnt get hit on at all (except for one guy who was like 7 feet tall, but it was just a compliment) and suprisingly ate the least of all the other people on the cruise....it was a lot of fun.

i somehow gained 4 pounds since my last doctor visit, which means in the interim i lost 15 and gained back 19. way to go!!!! on a happier note, i did grow 1/4 of an inch in a year and a half...suck on that one.

errr.
this could be why i havent updated in a month.

ok.
so i been working a lot this week.

i got me some ghetto ass clothes from EPIC and LAW jeans.w00t.

i decided that alex+bridgeview+liquor=me talking to random people old enough to be my illegitimate father/dancing with random minorities/slash talking about peircings/giving out number/total mess.

i saw bourne supremacy with steffy d<3333matt damon i want to bear your illegitimate children.

made the BEST FUCKING MIX IN THE HISTORY OF BURNED CDS!!!

and yet somehow i was in a bad mood.

there are certain times
when i 
wish i was denis leary.

there are certain times when i just want to go on a fucking rant and let the total and utter truth come out. and then i realize im not an angry, well dressed, middle aged irish man.
and perhaps i shouldnt.

goulet.

anyways.
i dont know where i was going with that.
i have work tomorrow.
8 30 am woowoo

kill me

today i went to the zoo. there were no animals masturbating. i prayed an elephant would go crazy.  they just played with garbage cans.  my feet got very dirty.  i was sad when i found out that they no longer sell elephant noses. no good looking people go to the zoo. 

the other day i bought 2 bathing suits. neither bathing suit fits. i spent a total of 86 dollars. i drove on the parkway and realized that merging is bad. i also realized that everything in my aim profile has to do with guns. this must be because i love guns, despite never having held one in my whole life.

im bored at this moment. i have nothing to do. also, i feel kinda blah. hmm.

hey.

its been a while.
crazy times.

some body modification, carl bought me a 40 oz!!!!, lots of hanging with leah and stinky, SO MANY BUG BITES!, finally getting paid--so nice to go out with money in my wallet for a change....and whatever else, a bunch of shit since my last update.

today i went to work at 10...hungover.... it must have been obvious because my uncle sent me around the corner to get him a bagel, and my self a cup of coffee.  i love my uncle dino, the job is awesome. i get paid well, i sit on aim, i go to ebaums world and watch obscene videos, and he pays me for it. what a guy.

after work i picked up m'lady and we went for lunch at stuff'n bagels. we then decided that it would be a good idea to waste our money on arts supplies. so we went home, made the best fucking mix ever and went to pearl paints. we got canvasses! and i bought letters to make some new shirts so get ready for what im bringing.

me and leah painted pictures for each other. i got one that looks like jungle fever alex, and leah got my attempt at being an artist/my tribute to big pun. they came out really nice.

after my grandpa called me snot nosed, and i walked my house in a towel, i proceeded to alison's where we then went to get 3 boxes of pizza rolls (which we ate) cigarettes and to stalk past some peoples houses. watched good old pulp fiction and loafed.
lovely rainy night.

im starting to resemble bhudda, so it is time i start going back to the gym. i have to stop drinking, and diet. im going to be one miserable motherfucker, but if i dont start im gonna start getting stopped for autographs by star wars nerds who think im fuckin jabba.
shiiit

arg.
ok so i dont think ive updated in half a week! OH NO!

i probably have spent most of that time sleeping, drinking, or eating. not neccessarily simultaneously, but perhaps.

my life is so pathetic. i thought i would be really busy this summer, what with 2 jobs and all, but im just a poor, bored, pale little girl.

last night we went to bridgeview. the whole night cost me 5 dollars, and while i really didnt get shitty, it was ok.  i like going out with joie, jessie, cat, and stef(who actually wasnt there)...joie especially is helping to build my tolerance.  we danced a little bit, but for some reason only scary/smelly/creepy/ugly foreign guys want to dance with me. i was in an arabian sandwich at one point and they all thought it was too funny to save me. thats ok, ill have my revenge.......
saw dennes, who seems to be everywhere i go drunk as a skunk and trying to get me to grab his ass.  he was with finn *sigh* who i had the biggest crush on in 9th grade. it sucked to see him while i looked all gross, but he remembered me which was exciting. im such a fagggg. anyways, ash kim and corey were there too and it was nice to see them again.

went home early, cause the music sucked, but jessie stayed. went to GC's where everyone was passed out, so me spoon and cat watched adult swim. consumed massive cheese sandwiches to replace taco's and went home.

now im bored as hell. i was supposed to work today and im not...whatever. my food is here

ANCHORMAN TOMORROW NIGHT!!

la la la.

ok so yeah that last entry was uber bitter.  the end of the year was nice, and i enjoyed everything that went on, and im sure ill eventually post pictures. just not yet.

first i have to say i love dan tain.  he steals my surveys, yet credits me with having them first.  he then proceedes to fill them out much better that i ever could.
dan tain, i give you props.


so yesterday i woke up late and had to go to work.  it was ok, except my foot split open while i was at orientation and now i think its going to have to be amputated. yikes!!!! but i digress...so i had work and then i came home and had pizza e birra con la mia madre and il mio padre.  then my italian stallion, matthew bussa<3333, came over bearing gifts.  a bottle of grappa, a roma scarf, and an obscne keychain.  he showed us his pictures, and then we hung out for a while which consisted of us doing nothing but wrestling and arguing...whats new. 

then i went to andrew's.  erik was there too,but he left early.  i had a really nice time with andrew.  we wound up just laying on the couch listening to music and talking, it was a lot of fun...except i had to leave early because he had work the next day, but its ok.

stopped by brians bbq before i went home.
and that was my night.

oh yeah today is my graduation party, anybody up for frozen margharita's and beer...stop by.

ok.
graduation sucked.

prom was ok.

orientation sucked.

IM SO SICK!!!!!!!

woo! lawdy lawdy!

ok so i dont fit into any of my clothes anymore.  i blew up like the fucking good year blimp and i didnt even get knocked up! hahaha.

so i feel like friday sucked.  i had work and then a graduation party that i drove to and didnt have very many friends at.  its ok tho, because i like sammy and there were a few people there for me to talk to, i just chose to be anti-social.
me and steve rosener smoked cigarettes outside and talked about the genius of ben stiller.
also, tommy and i drove around blasting big tymers and talking. so that was fun.

i went home really early, but before i went home i called dirocco to get dibs on her for saturday night.
oh what a saturday. we started off at adam miller's where i talked with my love LORNE and spoke with brian fox aka charlies angel about brad pitt and other men we find attractive.  then we left because the library was closing and it was TWENTY BUCKS ALL YOU CAN DRINK! i never knew how shitty the library really was, but it was so worth going to the class of 2002 reunion for OPEN BAR DUDE!!!!
lets just say dirocco got her money's worth. and i think i did too. took it kind of easy, would have liked to stay longer, but what are you gonna do? somehow i lost jessies there. wtf? my closet is bigger than that place.

i drank mostly kettle one and pineapple juice all night, which rocks, but i found an awesome drink--stoli peach and sprite!!!! i think i got more stoli on me then in me, so right before we leave i go to get another one, and im waiting at the bar, and the bartender just walks over to me without asking, pours a full shot of jack, pushes it in front of me and leaves.
it was ridic. i had fun and tucc was awesome for staying sober for the most part.

this morning jessie calls me to tell me shes still alive, and i hear all about her battle wounds.  because i am turning into paul yuskevich, my stomach demanded egg and cheese, and i picked up dirocco for a nice post drinking breakfast.  her mom put me on the spot, but it was funny cause she asked me if jessie was high on drugs. HAHHAHHAHAHAHA.

went to 2-4, chilled with jessie and my lady leah and enjoyed my DISCOUNTED egg and cheese!! :)))

wooowoo!

wow.
im a fucking mess.

school is over and done with and its nice to be a bum for a change....a bum with 2 jobs that is.

already i've managed to start my summer off in a great way.

ok.
its so funny how quickly shit changes.
one minute im so happy, the next minute im doubled over in pain, lying in bed, and going to the emergency room.

so after i wrote a really happy lj entry this morning, i go to gym and then to APES.  since i am a tub of lard and all i do is eat, i sat eating my breakfast in class. suddenly im not hungry. then im in total pain.
everyone thought it was funny. thanks for laughing at me!!
(in case that didnt register, i was not pleased)

so i go home and because i cant have a regular doctor i have to go to the emergency room.  by the time i get there im not in pain anymore, yet i have to waste my entire day there.  i had to get an IV in my hand a cat scan. woowooowoo.im wearing the hospital bracelet as proof that i wasnt cutting.

so a small cyst burst on my ovary in case anyone cares and im fine. but honestly, i dont think anyone does care.  and at risk at sounding like a bitchy little girl, no one calls me. and yeah i go out i guess, but i spend every weekedn playing the role of third wheel, which i still have to call to do, and no one really cares.  its probably my fault, but its really disheartening when everyone is out and no one freakin hits you up. one person knew i was in the emergency room, so there is no reason for this.

so suck a fucking egg.
